items.sentence: I really don\'t feel like talking right now.
I really want to know what\'s going on here.
You\'re to have no further contact with Tom.
Tom said he would only stay for a few hours.
Does Tom know why you weren\'t at his party?
Don\'t pay any attention to what people say.
Don\'t you think we made the wrong decision?
I don\'t even know what Tom\'s last name is.
Tom and Mary clinked their glasses together.
Tom and Mary exchanged numbers at the party.
Tom and Mary gathered flowers in the meadow.
Tom and Mary have one daughter and two sons.
I don\'t know why Tom needs that much money.
They are on good terms with their neighbors.
They spoke too quickly for me to understand.
They wanted Tom dead even more than you did.
Who is playing the piano in the living room?
Why are you happy when someone else suffers?
Why are you in such a bad mood this evening?
Why are you still up? You should get to bed.
